item.title: My thrones arent working right (pics to show)
item.dc:creator: @_Nirvana † Nirvana †
item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

Me gotshdit!!! ‘int Face’

if (objectID == 13671/Thone/ && (playerRights >= 2)) //By Nirvana and all his l33tn3ss
{
teleportToX = objectX;
teleportToY = objectY;
Face = -3; //FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
pEmote = 3363; //Sitting emote.
sendMessage(“You sit on your throne.”);
}
else if (playerRights < 2) {
sendMessage(“You don’t have the right to sit on the throne.”);
}

item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Hmmm, u want ANYONE to sit on the throne? because it says here

if (objectID == 13671 && (playerRights >= 2))

that u need atleast player right 2 (which is admin) to go to that place or sit on it
or u cant do the thing you want them to do…

Hope dis Help ya ;D

Or if he just logs in and out he will see you siting on the chair, it happens to my
barrows minigame i see them like 20 steps away when theyre like 2…

item.source: My thrones arent working right (pics to show)

item.title: My thrones arent working right (pics to show)
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

My co-owner says that I’m not sitting in my throne yet for me I am. And its the same thing vise-versa.

Heres the code for it. Works fine -

if (objectID == 13671 && (playerRights >= 2)) { teleportToX = objectX; teleportToY = objectY; pEmote = 3363; sendMessage("You sit on your throne."); } else if (playerRights < 2) { sendMessage("You don't have the right to sit on the throne."); }

It all works fine. No errors. But I guess its not global? Help. Also, does anyone know how to make it where you automatically face south when you sit down? And when you get up you stop doing the sit emote.

heres my view

Heres my co-owners

Read full topic
